summary: put all one handed swords and two handed swords \'\'Silent\'\'
descriptionHtml:
This mod make all one handed and two handed Swords \'\'silent\'\' for some people, it get annoying to be unable to sneak kill with his katana or two handed greatsword :)
now its possible !

it only change the weapon of the vanilla game \'\'skyrim\'\' 
dragonborn and dawnguard swords is still not silent...
no mod is needed to use this one.
this mod doesnt work with other adding weapon mods.

now every ninja, samourai and roleplay flavoured character sneaking with 2 handed or one handed is possible !!!

enjoy and give feedback!
author: Gaboury
